data.text: @DeadTwista1972 @BostonDotCom Vaccines and masks are very helpful. I am no longer convinced that, especially with the new variants, distancing makes much of a difference anymore

@BostonDotCom Elections are coming up! What a fake POS. Like we forgot how he literally THREATENED Americans and told us we were going to die. "A pandemic of the unvaccinated," pitting families and friends against each other. Destroying families, businesses.  Shots were duds and killed people.
@BostonDotCom He also said vaccines stop transmission. This is a lie.
@BostonDotCom Translation: Have you seen those fucking poll numbers????
@BostonDotCom Believe the science (up until the numbers in the midterm elections start looking bad).
@Eiger51 @BostonDotCom You retweet trump Jr, we know who the moron is.

@BostonDotCom His vaxx mandates have dictated how we live and have divided friends, families and this country. People are still losing their jobs and college kids are getting expelled . The vaxx had risk and should not be mandated.
